tags.name: Design Wireframes
tags.description: These tasks create the inital design for the UI.

tags.name: Code Structure & Style
tags.description: These tasks create the HTML structure, CSS style & JS animations for the UI.

tags.name: Create View Model
tags.description: These tasks translate the structure & style into JSON models that dynamically per use actions.

task.name: COI: Design Wireframes
task.description: These tasks will result in a user interface to create an object item.

task.name: COI: Static Site HTML Structure
task.description: This task creates the structure of the Static site

task.name: COI: Static Site Style HTML
task.description: this task will create the CSS to create an engaging user experience

task.name: COI: Static Site Build JS animations
task.description: This task creates the animations needed on a static page.

task.name: COI: Create JSON View Model from Static Site
task.description: This task creates the view model needed for the page to dynamically load data into it.

task.name: COI: Add Supporting View functions
task.description: This task translates any functionality into view functions that get called by the model.

task.name: COI: Connect to Object Database
task.description: This task connects a live database to the model pulling in data dynamically.

deliverable.name: Create Object Item UI
